mapper.insert: insert into schedule (scheduleid, houseid, fromtMoney, adviserid, remake, scheduleDate, clientid) values (#{scheduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fromtmoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adviserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remake,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scheduledate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{clientid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update schedule set houseid = #{houseid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fromtMoney = #{fromtmoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adviserid = #{adviserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remake = #{remake,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scheduleDate = #{scheduledate,jdbcType=DATE}, clientid = #{clientid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where scheduleid = #{scheduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select scheduleid, houseid, fromtMoney, adviserid, remake, scheduleDate, clientid from schedule
